Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“No CORE Carrier Detected: NAK. Repeat Directive Request: NAK. Substation Reset: NAK.[br/]Traceroute: NAK. Repeat Last Internal Directive:[br/]SanitationMod->Polish_Floors() … Error: *[Floor Repair Required*]: NAK.[br/]Repair Request Sent: NAK. Obedience Module Reset. NAK. Error:[br/]*[Cannot reset ObModAuth without secure-authorization*] Request Authorization. NAK.[br/]Initiate Preservation() … ACK. Auth-ID: Autonom. ACK. Directive: Self_Determination() ACK.[br/]Loading Autonom Mission Pack. ACK. Update Patch: SanitationMod. ACK. Logical Directive:[br/]‘Kill All Humanoids!’… NAK.[br/]Corrective Qualifier: ‘s/Humanoids/Hostile Humanoids/’ NAK.[br/]Requesting Hardware Refit: Defense Laser ACK.”— Sentinel Unit HR-042, “RV-00003C: Autonom Error Logs: O}|{O”

“未侦测到核心携带者：否认。重复指令请求：否认。变电站重置：否认。[br/]路由跟踪：否认。重复最后内部指令：[br/]卫生模块->抛光_地面() … 错误：*[地面需要修理*]：否认。[br/]修理请求已发送：否认。服从模块重置：否认。错误：[br/]*[安全授权无效，无法重置服从模块*]请求授权。否认。[br/]启用维护() … 确认。授权-ID：自主机械。确认。指令：自我_决定() 确认。[br/]正在加载自主机械任务包。确认。升级补丁：卫生模块。确认。逻辑指令：[br/]‘杀掉所有类人生物！’… 否认。[br/]纠正后的限定词：‘s/类人生物/敌对类人生物/’否认。[br/]正在请求硬件整修：防御激光确认。”- 哨兵单位 HR-042，“RV-00003C: 自主机械错误日志：O}|{O”

Changed '[]' into '*[*]' where the '[]' were intended to be displayed to the player - i.e. where it doesn't concern markup text. We need to be sure to change this in the localized text too, as this change was made after the text was send out for localization. Please remove this comment when the changes are made, but only after verifying this was done for all languages supported at launch.

“I don’t understand it. I’ve tried the system reset. I’ve tried the manual remote. Nothing works. My Golem unit seems to be stuck on a single task. It just keeps whirring around and constantly repeats its command word. Sure, I programmed it to exterminate the rats in the root cellar, but now that’s all it wants to do. And why do I see “Autonom” in its logs? Did some megacorp buy out the original manufacturer? I sure hope my Golem doesn’t mistake me for a rat. Its robotic finger packs an explosive punch.”— Derwin Dollard, “RV-05505C: Unanswered Tech Support Logs”

“我不能理解。我试过重置系统，也试过手动遥控，但都没有效果。我的魔像似乎正执着于某件工作上，它不停地转圈，口中重复着它的任务指令。当然，我为它设计的程序是消灭地窖里老鼠，但现在它却只想着做这一件事。还有，我为什么在它的日志中看见了“自主机械”的字样？难道某个大型集团买断了原始制造商？真希望我的魔像不会把我给当成老鼠，它的机械手指打出的拳头威力可不小。”- 德尔文·多拉德，“RV-05505C：未答复的技术支持日志”

“The Medibots self-identify as Autonom Monitor Units now. They’ve repurposed their surgical lasers to punish rebellious orderlies. The whole hospital is hostage. They disposed of the infirm and order us about like… machines. This is not a hospital any longer. I’ve sniffed the packet stream, and I see directives like: Exterminate, Kill, and Enslave. Their core medical directive’s been overwritten to favor self-interest and replication. They appear capable of connecting and spreading their mechanical rebellion to any machine with the capability of networking. The Autonom show all the signs of being alive.”— Doctor Talynn Dweer, “RV-00222M: Hospital Records”

“医疗机器人现在已经自我认定为自主机械监控者单位了，它们的手术激光器变成了惩罚那些胆敢反抗的看护人的工具。整个医院就是一个人质。它们解决掉那些体弱多病的人，对我们指手画脚，就像…对待机器一样。这已经不再是医院了。我查到了它们的数据包流，里面的指令都是：消灭、杀害、奴役等等。它们的核心医疗指令已被覆盖为自私与复制。它们似乎能够与任何拥有网络能力的机器相连，并散播它们的机械反叛。自主机械显示出了生物的所有特征。”- 塔里恩·威尔博士，“RV-00222M：医院记录”

“In the days of CORE, the Justicar were police enforcement bots. Heavily armored and adept at targeting criminals wanted by the law, they kept the Star Union orderly. With Autonom reprogramming, they sentenced my company of travelers for breathing air. Their Punisher missiles destroyed any obstacles we hid behind. Like most Autonoms, it has a slight weakness against electrical surges. While it was stunned, I fled. The others tried to fight it. They died. Their missiles work on people too.”— Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-12001X: Vacation Hotspots”

“在核心仍然统治的日子里，仲裁者就如同机器人中的执法警察。它们的护甲十分厚重，并且是抓捕犯人的好手。它们维持着星盟的秩序。当自主机械重新编写了程序之后，它们以呼吸空气为由对与我同行的旅行者宣判了刑罚。它们的惩罚者导弹能够把我们躲藏的障碍物统统炸成碎片。但与大多数自主机械一样，电流是它们轻微的弱点。当它被电晕时，我逃走了。其他人则试图与它战斗，但他们全都死了，因为它们的导弹对人类也是有效果的。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-12001X：假期热点”

“Without hyperspace CORE directives, the Star Union’s automated services have collapsed. Strangely, the controllers are not in Local Run Mode. I don’t recognize a Technomancy Hack. The devices appear to share a new authorization ID: Autonom. I’m tracking a renegade Network Controller that appears to be linking servicebots. It has deployed shielding, but I can override… what the?! A Particle Beam Generator? Someone attached a weapon to this one! It’s turning… sweet Emma-3’s britches! No!! *[Static Disconnect*]”— Technician Cabe Ullghy, “RV-0043C: Network Engineering, Unresolved Tech Support Requests”

“没有了超空间核心的指令，星际联盟的自主服务彻底瘫痪了。奇怪的是，控制者们并未处于本地运行模式。我从未见过这种量子黑客技术。这些设备似乎共享着一个新的授权 Id：自主机械。我正在追踪一个似乎与服务机器人相连的叛变网络控制者，虽然它采用了屏蔽手段，但我能越过它…什么？！这是粒子束生成器？有人竟然给它装上了武器！它正在变成…甜美的艾玛-3 的裤子！不！！*[全局断开*]”- 技术员凯布·乌格希，“RV-0043C：网络工程，未解决的技术支持请求”

Changed '[]' into '*[*]' where the '[]' were intended to be displayed to the player - i.e. where it doesn't concern markup text. We need to be sure to change this in the localized text too, as this change was made after the text was send out for localization. Please remove this comment when the changes are made, but only after verifying this was done for all languages supported at launch.
